title: Nothingâ€™s first smartphone is called the Nothing Phone 1, and it will come with Nothing OS
content:
After sharing cryptic teasers over the last couple of weeks, Nothing has now finally confirmed that its first smartphone — the Nothing Phone 1 — will hit the shelves this summer. At its The Truth event today, Nothing’s CEO Carl Pei revealed that the Nothing Phone 1 will pack a Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset and run

The post Nothing’s first smartphone is called the Nothing Phone 1, and it will come with Nothing OS appeared first on xda-developers.
description: At Nothing's The Truth event today, CEO Carl Pei has officially confirmed that the Nothing phone (1) with Nothing OS will launch this summer.
